content: अर्पणं [ऋ-णिच्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Placing or putting upon, setting upon; पादार्पणानुग्रहपूतपृष्ठं <ls>R. 2. 35.</ls> {@--2@} Inserting, placing or putting in. {@--3@} Giving, offering, resigning; स्वदेहार्पणनिष्क्रयेण <ls>R. 2. 55</ls>; मुखार्पणेषु प्रकृतिप्रगल्भाः <ls n="R.">13. 9</ls>; तत्कुरुष्व मदर्पणं <ls>Bg. 9. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Restoration, delivery, giving back; न्यास° <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--5@} Piercing, perforating; तीक्ष्णतुंडार्पणैर्ग्रीवां नखैः सर्वां व्यदारयत् <ls>Rām.</ls> (Said to mean also fire, god, an oblation, a Mantra and the tongue of fire-<ls>Tv.</ls>).
